# AVCaptureTimecode.SourceType.frameCount

**Case**

No internal or external source is adopted. Timecodes are zero-based, sequentially generated frame counts.

## Declaration

```swift
case frameCount
```

## Source types

- **AVCaptureTimecode.SourceType.external**: Synchronizes timecode to an external timecode data stream. Ideal for professional audio and video synchronization with external quarter-frame MIDI or HID timecode hardware.
- **AVCaptureTimecode.SourceType.realTimeClock**: Synchronizes timecode to the system clock for real-time applications. Useful for live events or scenarios requiring alignment with the actual time of day.
